name: Sibol and the Serpent Spear
description:
Master the spear "Bakunawa" and aim to become the best hunter in this third-person-shooter mini game set in a Filipino mythology universe.

Sibol and Bakunawa

Explore the training grounds and plan your execution.

Extend your time with Sundials.

Sibol and the Serpent Spear is a 3rd Person Shooter with one level of aim training. Beat the clock by hitting all targets and achieve the highest score!

Initially created for the 48-hour GMTK Game Jam 2020 held last July 11 to 12 with the theme "Out of Control." Unfortunately, the first version was a couple of seconds late to submission, but I still continued its development.

Now a week later, the game is updated to version 1.1, where bugs are fixed, menu features are added and graphics are improved.

Gameplay inspired by games like Resident Evil 2 remake and Overwatch.

To see more games & updates, you can follow me on my social media below:

 Twitter @polysplitgames

 Facebook @polysplitgames

Maraming Salamat! Enjoy the game!

Controls

Keyboard Controls:

WASD or Directional Keys - Movement
Mouse  - Look
Mouse Left Button - Aim/Fire
Escape - Pause Menu

Joystick Controls:

Left Stick - Movement
Right Stick - Look
Right Trigger - Aim/Fire
Start - Pause Menu
